issues.issue_description: Missing DOCTYPE declaration - should be at the very top of the document
issues.suggested_fix: Ensure DOCTYPE is the first line without any whitespace before it

issues.issue_description: Generic page title 'Time' - should be more descriptive for SEO
Missing meta description tag for SEO optimization
issues.suggested_fix:
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<meta name="description" content="A beautiful digital clock displaying real-time hours, minutes, and seconds">

issues.issue_description: External CSS file 'style.css' referenced but may not exist - could cause 404 error
issues.suggested_fix: Verify style.css exists or add inline styles as fallback

issues.issue_description: Missing alt attributes and ARIA labels for accessibility
Clock spans lack semantic meaning - should use time element
Script tag should be in head with defer attribute for better performance
Missing favicon link - browser will make unnecessary 404 request
No noscript fallback - users with JavaScript disabled see nothing
issues.suggested_fix:
<script src="script.js"></script>
<noscript>Please enable JavaScript to view the clock.</noscript>

issues.issue_description: Missing Open Graph meta tags for social media sharing
issues.suggested_fix:
Add: <meta property="og:title" content="Digital Clock">
<meta property="og:description" content="Real-time digital clock display">

issues.issue_description: Empty div with class 'hero' - unclear purpose, may be unnecessary wrapper
issues.suggested_fix: Consider removing unnecessary wrapper divs or add semantic HTML5 elements like <main> or <section>

issues.issue_description: No error handling if script.js fails to load
